  sgcool_label_text: This baju panjang has a mandarin collar and gold frog buttons. The fabric is thin and embroidered with flowers. In late 19th century Java
 there was a large selection of materials to choose from for the making of baju panjang
 including silk
 European cotton and velvet. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.

metadata.title_text: Baju Panjang with Gold Frog Buttons
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a baju panjang. It has a mandarin collar and gold frog buttons. The fabric is decorated with an embroidery of flowers.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This baju panjang has a mandarin collar and gold frog buttons. The fabric is thin and embroidered with flowers. In late 19th century Java, there was a large selection of materials to choose from for the making of baju panjang, including silk, European cotton and velvet. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
